metadata.name: UrbanSprout Gardens
metadata.description: Urban garden specialists focused on transforming urban spaces into vibrant, green environments.

metadata.name: Famous Botanical Gardens Around the World
metadata.description: The world's largest flower is the Rafflesia arnoldii, which can grow up to three feet in diameter and is known for its foul odor.

metadata.name: Elysian Gardens
metadata.description: Enigmatic botanical sanctuary, where bioluminescent flora create a surreal, dreamlike world after dusk.

metadata.name: Urban Community Gardens
metadata.description: Initiatives to grow fresh produce and combat food insecurity in cities.

metadata.name: 1hive gardens
metadata.description:
ðŸŒ±ï»¿ Gardens is a 1Hive initiative to create a template for public communities to coordinate shared resources from the bottom-up, taking the best lessons learned from the 1Hive community and allowing any DAO to implement them in a plug-and-play fashion. 

With Gardens, anyone can set up a DAO in minutes, leveraging Conviction Voting, a Community Covenant, and the Celeste arbitration protocol, while also getting the network effects of joining a community of quickly blooming Gardens DAOs.

This Hypercert is awarded to supporters of 1Hive Gardens in GG18.
